TopicTitle: How to post images from Imgur?

Articles.Content:
I can't seem to get the [ IMG ] or [ IMGUR ] tags to work.

I'm following the instructions here .... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users?p=637095#post637095

but I get only a blank space with the [ IMG ] tags.

Make sure the URL you are putting inside the ), right-click on the image itself and select Copy Image URL. (Some browsers will have this called something slightly different, but it should be recognisable.)

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 800]

[TR]

[TD]Then, come back to the forum and insert the image URL inside the IMG tags like so:

[noparse]http://i.imgur.com/R7GkBfC.jpg' alt='R7GkBfC.jpg'>[/noparse]

In this case, this gives the following:

[/TD]

[TD]Imgur albums are slightly different. An album page link looks like this: http://imgur.com/a/szz8j#0

The part of the link you need to copy is bold and underlined -- you need the jumble of letters and numbers after the last /, and before the #. If your link does not have a # at or near the end, just copy last part of the link and throw it inside the

[noparse][imgur]szz8j">Javascript is disabled. View full album

[/noparse]

Which should result in this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

(placed in a table to avoid super ridiculously long post)
